title: Sel没ne's Dream
content:
Selune's Dream Evocation Cantrip 1~8 Healing 1d8 An ally you touch regains 1d8 hit points, but potentially falls into a slumber. Melee Long Rest Action

Evocation Cantrip

An ally you touch regains 1d8 hit points, but potentially falls into a slumber.

Sel没ne's Dream is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Sel没ne's Dream is a Cantrip from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
